name: Noir Investigations
description:
A private investigator is asked to investigate the murder of a crazy elf inventor.

How to play:

  • Point And Click
  • Keyboad:
    • Arrow keys to move
    • Enter/Spacebar for action button
    • Escape key to open menu and cancel

This game is not yet finished. It is going to be queer aside from being a detective adventure game.
